Cell.Data: You can't reach this skill yet
你还不能激活这个技能。
You have invested points waiting for confirmation. Would you like to confirm them ?
你已经消耗了技能点。是否要确认？
Would you like to reset your progression in the Gate of Fates ? You will get all you passive skills points back.
你想要在命运之门里重置你的进度吗？所有的技能点将被返还。
The Passive Skills have been modified since the last time you played and we had no other choice but to reset your progression in the Gate of Fates.
被动技能已被改动，我们已经在命运之门里重置了你的进度。
This Passive Skill is not implemented yet. Taking it won't cost you any skill point.
这项被动技能还未完成。激活它不会消耗技能点。
You need to stand next to the Gate of Fates in Amarth to rotate the Rings
你需要站在阿玛斯的命运之门旁边才能转动圆环。
You don't have enough skill points to spend
Weapons or fists, you name it.
Some say I'm quick tempered. The truth is, they are too slow.
有些人说我性子太急。事实上，是他们太慢了。
Here’s something they don’t teach in the Legion : failing.
有件事军团是不会教你的：失败。
I don't need arrows or bolts with a sword that long.
长剑足矣，无需箭和螺栓。
You have something on your head… got it.
你头上有东西。。。明白了吧。
Keep your friends distant, and your enemies even more.
越疏远朋友，敌人就越多。
There are two rules for success: 1) Don't tell all you know.
成功有两条准则：1）说话留一半。
People say a wizard never reveals his secrets, so I’m not going to tell you the rest of this story.
人们常说一个法师从不泄露他的秘诀，所以你得自己挖掘剩余的部分。
Nothing can beat the power of the mind.
Some of us feel the urge to choose between sorcery and weapons. I choose violence.
我们中的一些人急于在魔法和物理中做出选择。我选择两者兼有。
I'm one with the Umbra, and the Umbra is with me.
Adaptation is the only reason our World survived so far.
适者生存使我们苟活至今的唯一原因。
I don't think that's intended, but that mixture tastes pretty good.
我不认为这是有意的，但这混合物尝起来挺不错。
I will have my vengeance, in this life or the next.
我将大仇得报，这辈子或者下辈子。
A day without killing is a day wasted.
Everybody dies eventually. But you first.
每个人都会死。但你是第一个。
Did you know that if I take all the veins from your body and lay them end to end… you will die ?
你猜猜如果我把你的动脉拉出来首尾相接围成一个圈。。。会死人不？
I'm going to fill your body with holes. So to speak.
我会让你千疮百孔。打个比方。
My girlfriend accused me of cheating. I told her she was starting to sound like my wife.
我的女伴指责我作弊。我告诉她这听上去就像我的妻子。
Who said ranged weapons were meant to be used from a long distance ?
谁说远程武器一定要远距离使用的？
Of course you should fight fire with fire. You should fight everything with fire.
我很震惊，字面意思上的。
Your body is a maze designed for Lightning to propagate.
你的身躯被设计成让闪电传播的迷宫。
Who need swords when you control the Storm ?
当你能控制风暴时谁还需要剑？

每次攻击有%1几率禁锢敌人%2

给所有的远程武器提供%2原始本影伤害状态加成
%2 to Physical Resistance when your Umbra is empty
%2 to Spells Damage when your Umbra is full
%2 to all Damage done against Frozen, Burning or Stunned enemies
攻击冰冻，燃烧和眩晕的敌人%2所有伤害
All Umbra Damage become Lightning Damage, Sacred Damage become Fire Damage and Shadow Damage become Frost Damage
所有的本影伤害转化为闪电伤害,神圣伤害转化为火焰伤害，暗影伤害转化为冰冻伤害
%2 to Spells Resistance if your Health is full
生命值全满时%2法术抗性

受到任何元素伤害%1同种元素伤害，持续%2(叠加%3次)

每秒获得%2元素伤害(最高叠加%1次,造成非元素伤害时重置)
%2 to the duration of Burning, Freezing and Shocking effects you inflict
%2燃烧，冻结和电击的持续时间

每次击杀后你的下一次闪避总会成功(持续%2)

每次攻击获得两层动量吸收，最大叠加层数翻倍

致命一击每次提供%2伤害加成,最大可以叠加%1次

移动中或停止移动%2后%1物理伤害和攻击速度

停止移动后动量技能持续时间增加%2
Increases by %2 all Damage taken from the last hit enemy, but decreases by %1 all Damage taken from all other enemies
上个攻击的敌人对你的伤害提高%2，其他敌人对你的伤害下降%1。

每个未使用的耐力点%2所有物理伤害

如果你的目标死亡，"细致的杀手" 层数会得到保留

%2 to Critical Chance (Spells) if your Umbra is full (bonus decreasing linearly with your current Umbra)

%2所有技能的连击时间(可以很容易地达到更高的连击等级)
Continuously shooting the same enemy may double your next shot
向同一个敌人连续射击时伤害可能翻倍
Your ranged shots have a %1 Chance to bounce to another enemy in a %2 radius
你的射击有%1几率在%2半径内的其他敌人间弹跳

捡起一个本影球后%1施法速度，持续%2

%1 to all Physical Damage and suspended Umbra Generation during %2 when your Rage becomes full
怒气值全满时%1所有物理伤害并暂停本影的回复，持续%2
Increases by %1 your Open Wound Chance on Bleeding skills
使用流血技能增加%1重伤几率
Each strike with Dual Daggers increases by %1 the Open Wound Chance of Bleeding skills during %2 (stackable %3 times)
使用双持匕首每次攻击增加%1流血技能的重伤几率，持续%2（可叠加%3次）
%1 Chance to cause a %2 Open Wound on critical strikes (Melee only)

翻滚时有%1几率对周围敌人造成一次持续%2的重伤效果

近战攻击有%2几率引发重伤效果
%1 to Bleeding Damage of inflicted Open Wounds
Allows your Bleeding effects to deal critical Damage
允许流血效果造成暴击伤害
%1 Chance to Fear enemies during %2 on hits
攻击有%1几率恐惧敌人，持续%2
对被恐惧的敌人增加%2伤害
%2 to your Life On Hit Chance
%1 Chance to steal %2 Health points on Hits
每次命中有%1几率偷取%2生命值
%1 Chance to cause a %2 Open Wound on critical strikes (Ranged only)
暴击有%1几率引发一次持续%2的重伤效果(远程)

受攻击速度影响增加所有流血效果的出血几率
%1 to the Bleeding Damage Rate of Bleeding enemies during %2 when hitting them
攻击敌人时%1出血几率，持续%2

造成燃烧伤害时有%1几率触发一次持续%2的狂暴
%1 Chance to trigger a %2 Frenzy when inflicting a Poisoning Damage
造成毒素伤害时有%1几率触发一次持续%2的狂暴
%2 Chance to clear up to %1 Burning stacks when Dodge-rolling (Chance is increased if you are in water, even more if it rains)
翻滚时有%2几率清除%1层燃烧效果(在水中几率提高，雨中更高)
%2 to the duration of all Burning effects you inflict

燃烧效果会阻止敌人回复生命
%2 Chance to Propagate Flames with Fire skills
火焰技能%2几率传播火焰
每次攻击叠加%1燃烧伤害，持续%2
Lightning Damage can set your enemies on Fire as well as Shocking them (based on your Shocking Chance and Damage)

所有的火焰法术现在都会焚烧地面

%1 to the Damage done by the propagated Lightnings in water. Gives you a small chance to propagate Lightning attacks even out of water.

生命球现在也会给生命药水充能%1

生命药水失去治愈效果，但会大幅度提高玩家的生命回复

装备的药水和毒药充能速度增加%2

Your Dodge roll is permanently replaced by a Protection Form that lasts %2 per Stamina point (stackable %1 times) and gives you extra Armor, Stun, Knock-back and Blown-Away Resistances while reducing you Movement Speed. Fully compatible with what previously affected the Dodge Roll.
翻滚被永久替换为防御姿态，每个耐力点增加持续时间%2(叠加%1次),获得额外的护甲，眩晕，反击和击退抗性并降低玩家的移动速度。继承之前翻滚的所有效果。~
Increases by %2 the invulnerability time of the Protection Form
防御姿态的无敌时间增加%2
Instantly heals %2 of your maximum Health when you cast the Protection Form
启动防御姿态时立刻回复最大生命值的%2
When in Protection Form, you get a %2 Physical Damage bonus for each Constitution point you have
进入防御姿态后，物理伤害增加体力值的%2
Break Stun effect when you launch the Protection Form (%2 Cooldown)
启动防御姿态时可以打断眩晕效果(%2冷却时间)
Each hit done with Two-handed Hammer increases by %1 your Physical Impulse Chance with Impulsion skills during %2 (stackable %3 times)
双手锤每下命中会增加%1冲击技能的物理冲击几率，持续%2(叠加%3次~)

用盾牌挡住的攻击不会产生击退效果
%1 Chance to Knock-down enemies around you when Dodge-rolling
翻滚时有%1几率击倒周围的敌人
You can't be Knocked-down by attacks blocked by your shield
用盾牌格挡时不会被击倒
You get back on your feet faster after a Knock-down
You can return a Knock-down effect to its source if you raise your shield in time
如果你及时举起盾牌，就能把击倒效果返还给来源

Each Ardent stack increases your Burn Chance and Fire Damage with all Fire Spells and attacks
每层热忱都会提高你所有的火焰魔法和攻击的燃烧几率
You gain Ardent stacks faster, but reaching the maximum will cast a Fire Nova that harms enemies and yourself, removing all your stacks

Creates a Lightning Storm Area each time you hit the same area with Lightning spells (stackable intensity). May Shock enemies inside the zone.
使用闪电攻击同一区域制造一片闪电风暴区(叠加强度)并震荡其中的敌人。
Creates a Frost Storm Area each time you hit the same area with Frost spells (stackable intensity). May snare enemies inside the zone.
使用冰霜攻击同一区域制造一片冰霜风暴区(叠加强度)并束缚其中的敌人。
Creates a Fire Storm Area each time you hit the same area with Fire spells (stackable intensity). May hit and burn enemies inside the zone.
使用火焰攻击同一区域制造一片火焰风暴区(叠加强度)并击打和燃烧其中的敌人。

所有风暴区域的持续时间增加%1
Grants you a %2 Elemental Damage stack for each Storm stack when you're in a Storm Area (the Element type depends on the Storm stack type)
在风暴区中每层风暴堆叠数%2元素伤害叠加(元素类型取决于风暴类型~)
Grants you a %2 Elemental Resistance stack for each Storm stack when you're in a Storm Area (the Element type depends on the Storm stack type)

The Protective Storm and Destructive Storm bonus work for all your Storm Areas even if you're not in a Storm Area
